content: this pattern is for a longish mitt for dk yarn that goes about halfway up the arm in a waffle weave pattern to use less yarn or to get a shorter mitt i suggest halving the ribbing and wrist section before the gusset they are designed to match the violet waffle 1 hat pattern by halldora j materials/notions ½ hank of madelinetosh dk ~110 yards 3 stitch markers in contrasting colors one of one color two of another color 4 double point dp needles in us sizes 4 and 6 or whatever needle enables correct gauge the free pattern 2 is on my blog or as a pdf 3 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/violet-waffles 2 https //orcasislandknitting wordpress com/2015/04/13/warm-waffle-mitts/ 3 https //orcasislandknitting files wordpress com/2015/04/warm-waffle-mitt-pattern2 pdf
